SELECT Id, Name, Industry, NumberOfEmployees, BillingState FROM Account WHERE (Industry = 'Technology' OR Industry = 'Healthcare') AND (numberOFEmployees > 50 OR NumberOfEmployees < 10) AND BillingState = 'CA'

SELECT Id, Name, BillingState, Industry, NumberOfEmployees FROM Account WHERE (BillingState = 'CA' OR BillingState = 'NY') AND NOT (Industry = 'Retail' OR Industry = 'Government') OR NumberOfEmployees >= 100 AND NumberOfEmployees <= 500
SELECT Id, Name,  Status, CreatedDate FROM Lead WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_YEAR AND CreatedDate != LAST_MONTH AND Status IN ('Open - Not Contacted', 'Working - Contacted') limit 2

SELECT Id, Name, Industry FROM Account

SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Name, Amount, stageName, CloseDate FROM Opportunities ORDER BY Amount DESC LIMIT 5), (SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Contacts ORDER BY LastName ASC) FROM Account

SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Contact
SELECT AVG(NumberOfEmployees) FROM Account
SELECT Id, Name, Amount, StageName, CloseDate, (SELECT Name, Quantity, UnitPrice FROM OpportunityLineItems) FROM Opportunity

SELECT Id, Name, Amount, StageName, CloseDate, (SELECT Name, Quantity, UnitPrice FROM OpportunityLineItems) FROM Opportunity WHERE Account.Industry = 'Technology'
SELECT Id, Name, Amount, StageName, CloseDate, (SELECT Name, Quantity, UnitPrice FROM OpportunityLineItems ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 2) FROM Opportunity
